scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,client -c blue,green "npm run dev -w server" "npm run dev -w client"
scripts.build: npm run build -w server && npm run build -w client
scripts.start: concurrently -n server,client -c blue,green "npm start -w server" "npm start -w client"
scripts.debug: concurrently -n server,client -c blue,green "npm run debug -w server" "npm run debug -w client"
